mainChat

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainChat.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelInterface

    public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements ModelInterface
    Modifies data's structure when methods of this class are invoked from Controll class
    Author:
    Francesco Cozzolino, Stefano Belli

      • connectToServer

        public void connectToServer(java.lang.String ip,
                   int port,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String keyStore)
        Tries to connect to the user's server. Established the connection it's possible to sends/receives messages/files. For establishing a connection is necessary specify user's ip you want to chat,his router's port,his nickname and name of his keystore file
        Specified by:
        connectToServer in interface ModelInterface
        Parameters:
        ip - ip address of server
        port - router's port of server
        name - name of user who want to chat
